thread.section_title: Greenvelope.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greenvelope.com | greenvelope.com
thread.title: Katherine Tierney

author: Katherine Tierney
title: Katherine Tierney
text:
I absolutely loved my experience with Greenvelope. They have a huge array of basic designs that, unlike other online invitation sites, are extremely versatile and customizable. I had so much fun playing around with different base designs, fonts, envelope types, etc. Not only that, they don't end up charging you a fortune. I feel like I've gone through other sites before, gotten to checkout and thought "I could just send regular invitations for the same price!" I was pleased to find out this doesn't have to be the standard. This site also makes it very easy to check RSVPs, even allowing you to set a date for RSVP cut-off.
Overall, I just have to say that I've really enjoyed my experience with Greenvelope and I plan on using them again in the future.
